parameters: There is no problem, do not be too nervous
没什么大问题，不用太紧张
Rest for a while on the good, pay attention not to do intense exercise
休息一阵子就好，注意不要做激烈运动
So don't let her continue on the stage
所以你们的舞台剧可别让她继续上场了
I still have a lot of work to do here, so you'd better find someone to accompany her
我这边还有许多学园祭的工作要忙，你们最好找个人陪一下她
I have no problem with that!
There are so many things to do at the school festival, and I can't do it without you
学园祭那么多事情要忙，没了你可不行
All right then, but let me know right away if anything happens!
那好吧，但是有什么事要立刻告诉我哦
Ari San has been in poor health
雅莉同学她身体一直不好
When I first started school, my teacher told me
刚入学的时候，老师就有和我说过
She suffers from a relatively severe form of anemia and asked me to take extra care of her
她患有比较严重的贫血症，要我对她多加照顾
But she sometimes likes to be brave
但她有时候却喜欢逞强
One time before a sports exam, she insisted on taking
有次体育考试之前，她执意要参加
Practicing alone in the corner of the school when I don't know
在我不知道的时候一个人在学校角落偷偷练习
The result was found when already fainted there for a little while
结果被发现时已经晕倒在那里小半会儿了
There are many other cases like this
像类似的情况还有很多
I was worried for a while when she signed up for the lead role
她报名主演的时候我还担心了好一会
As a result, Ari's performance on stage was unexpectedly good!
结果雅莉她在舞台上的表现意外的好呢
But I didn't expect to have an accident…
但是没想到会发生了意外…
I hope she doesn't blame herself too much
There is no problem, the doctor said rest for a while will be fine
没什么大问题，医生说休息一阵子就好
That's good. I was worried about Ari San during rehearsals
那就好，排练的时候一直在担心雅莉
Well, our class rehearsal time is only in the morning
嗯，我们班的排练时间只有上午
And… the heroine is not in the really is not too good
而且…女主角不在果然还是不太行呢
Oh, by the way, I bought you lunch
对了，顺便还给你们买了午饭
I don't know what to buy for Ari
我也不知道要给雅莉同学买什么
I seldom go to SP commissary
I didn't expect that except salmon bentos are all strange things
没想到除了三文鱼便当都是些奇奇怪怪的东西
SP's barbecue has a fascinating magic
SP的烤肉有种让人着迷的魔力
Maybe this is the charm of high-quality barbecue
可能这就是高质量烤肉的魅力了吧
Really, I must try it next time
是吗，那我下次一定要尝一尝
And this, Ari San's notebook, is left in the gym
还有这个，雅莉同学的笔记本，落在体育馆了
Ceka asked me to take it back to the classroom, but since I'm here, I'll give it to Ari directly
西卡让我带回教室，不过既然来这了，就直接给雅莉吧
Ari San really wants to participate in this school festival
雅莉同学真的很想参与这次学园祭
She was so scared but still had the courage to sign up for the lead role
明明那么怕生却还是鼓起勇气报名了主角
Actually, she likes painting very much
According to my observation, she paints very well
而且依据我平日的观察，应该画得挺好的
(Aren't you guys not familiar with each other…)
But I'm afraid she'll be afraid to say it because she's worried and can't do it right
但是，我怕她会因为担心又做不好而不敢说出来
But if you invited her first
不过如果是你先邀请她
Then there should be no problem!
好吧，你都说到这份上了
I'll just have to accept it
I'll just have to accept it
But before that, I would like to ask
不过在这之前，我想先问一下
Why do you know Ari San so well?
你为什么这么了解雅莉同学？
There is no need to know such a thing
这事情你就不要管了吧
This is too much to care about
A notebook filled with post-it notes of various colors
夹满了各色的便签纸的本子
Hanging a pink, bear-decorated signature pen
挂着一支粉色的，带着小熊装饰的签字笔
I just want to see if there are any post-it notes that are going to fall out
我只是想看看有没有要掉出去的便签纸
Definitely not looking to see what's inside…
绝对不是想看里面的内容…
All the content is related to the stage…
全都是舞台剧相关的内容呢…
It seems that Ari has always been very concerned about the stage play……
看来雅莉一直都对舞台剧很关注呢…
It seems that Ari has always been very concerned about the stage play……
看来雅莉一直都对舞台剧很关注呢…
It looks like the blackboard will definitely win the first place this time!
看来这次黑板报肯定能拿第一了！
Ah, she doesn't seem to have said yes yet…
Sorry, I actually fell asleep on my own!
不好意思，我竟然自己睡着了！
I'm sorry! I peeked at your notebook!
对不起！我偷看了你的笔记本！
Thank you for always being with me…
It doesn't matter! I'm not much use staying there anyway… hahaha
没关系的！反正我留在那边也没什么用…哈哈哈
Do you want something to eat, Ari San?
雅莉同学要吃点东西吗？
Takuya San bought two salmon bento, I don't know if you like it or not
塔库亚同学买了两份三文鱼便当过来，不知道雅莉同学喜不喜欢
Yes! There is no better food in this world than salmon!
是的！这世上没有什么比三文鱼更美味的食物了！
那个…要谢谢…塔库亚…同学…
I'll pass it on for you~
Sorry… did not help… and everyone… added trouble
对不起…没能帮上忙…还给大家…添麻烦了
Ari San, in fact, also have some very admirable place it
雅莉同学，其实也有很让人敬佩的地方呢
In places where people don't notice, you've been working hard in silence
在大家没有注意到的地方，你一直在默默地努力着呢
I do not know why, I always feel a little understand your feelings…
我也不知道为什么，总觉得有点能理解你的的心情…
Let's not talk about that, you should like to draw a lot, right?
不说这个了，你应该很喜欢画画吧？
Ah… Shio… how did you know that?
You still spend a lot of time alone in the art room, right?
你还经常一个人呆在美术室里画画吧？
So, why not try the blackboard
所以，不如来试试黑板报吧
I am afraid… do not do well…
(It's the same as what Takuya said)
(She is worried that she will not do well again, right?)
That's right, I'm the one who drew the blackboard, you're just doing me a favor
没错，画黑板报的是我，你只是在帮我的忙
I have been afraid of thunder since I was a child…
Ari you feel better, while the rain is still small I send you home
雅莉你好些了吗，趁现在雨还小我送你回家吧
Ah… I don't have an umbrella…
After returning to the classroom with Ari to pack up their things
和雅莉回课室收拾好东西后
We left the school together with umbrellas
